messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] yucky new Breastfeeding show
messages.msgSnippet: I don t remember the name.  It is a new show and it is disgusting!  It s called Yes, Dear and its on CBS. Lynda ... From:  To:
messages.messageBody:
I don't remember the name. It is a new show and it is disgusting! It's
called "Yes, Dear" and its on CBS.

Lynda
----- Original Message -----
From: <Jaam1224@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 19, 2000 3:40 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] yucky new Breastfeeding show


> In a message dated 10/18/00 10:12:45 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
> Broadcolea@... writes:
>
> << I did happen to catch that new show that talked about extended nursing
and
> the boob thing. I watched the whole thing is complete disbelief and just
> wanted to scream at the mother, your baby is CRYING go pick him up and
nurse
> him!!. I think the kid was barely a year old. What was really sad is
the
> message it sent to a lot of woman who probably want to nurse longer but
feel
> that it isn't "right" according to society and so decide to stop. Yes,
you
> are right - letter writing time!
> >>
> Okay you are the second or third person I have heard talk about this new
> show. What is it about? Do you know the name? Date and time? So I can
pass
> it on to La Leche League and others. I need some information about it
before
> I can do anything......ooooooh I know I will go to NBCI.com and look. I
> think someone mentioned it was on Mondays. OOOOH, but I don't know if it
was
> on NBC. HELP!!!!
>
> Julie
>

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] yucky new Breastfeeding show
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/18/00 10:12:45 AM Eastern Daylight Time, Broadcolea@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/18/00 10:12:45 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
Broadcolea@... writes:

<< I did happen to catch that new show that talked about extended nursing and
the boob thing. I watched the whole thing is complete disbelief and just
wanted to scream at the mother, your baby is CRYING go pick him up and nurse
him!!. I think the kid was barely a year old. What was really sad is the
message it sent to a lot of woman who probably want to nurse longer but feel
that it isn't "right" according to society and so decide to stop. Yes, you
are right - letter writing time!
>>
Okay you are the second or third person I have heard talk about this new
show. What is it about? Do you know the name? Date and time? So I can pass
it on to La Leche League and others. I need some information about it before
I can do anything......ooooooh I know I will go to NBCI.com and look. I
think someone mentioned it was on Mondays. OOOOH, but I don't know if it was
on NBC. HELP!!!!

Julie
